religion_convert_effect_everything = {


###############################################################################################
###############################################################################################
################################################## Katholisch Part ############################
###############################################################################################
###############################################################################################

##################################################
######### Katholisch --> Protestant 
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea_group = katholisch0
		NOT = { has_idea = katholisch1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea = katholisch1
		NOT = { has_idea = katholisch2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea = protestant1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea = katholisch2
		NOT = { has_idea = katholisch3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea = protestant1
		add_idea = protestant2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea = katholisch3
		NOT = { has_idea = katholisch4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea = protestant1
		add_idea = protestant2
		add_idea = protestant3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea = katholisch4
		NOT = { has_idea = katholisch5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea = protestant1
		add_idea = protestant2
		add_idea = protestant3
		add_idea = protestant4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea = katholisch5
		NOT = { has_idea = katholisch6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea = protestant1
		add_idea = protestant2
		add_idea = protestant3
		add_idea = protestant4
		add_idea = protestant5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea = katholisch6
		NOT = { has_idea = katholisch7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea = protestant1
		add_idea = protestant2
		add_idea = protestant3
		add_idea = protestant4
		add_idea = protestant5
		add_idea = protestant6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea = katholisch7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea = protestant1
		add_idea = protestant2
		add_idea = protestant3
		add_idea = protestant4
		add_idea = protestant5
		add_idea = protestant6
		add_idea = protestant7
		}


##################################################
######### Katholisch --> Reformiert
##################################################

		if = {

		add_idea = confuci4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = katholisch5
		NOT = { has_idea = katholisch6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea = confuci1
		add_idea = confuci2
		add_idea = confuci3

		add_idea = confuci5
		}

		}

		add_idea = suomi4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {	
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
			religion = suomenusko
			}
		has_idea = katholisch5
		NOT = { has_idea = katholisch6 }
		}

		add_idea = suomi1
		add_idea = suomi2
		add_idea = suomi3

		add_idea = zoro2
		add_idea = zoro3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea = katholisch4
		NOT = { has_idea = katholisch5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea_group = zoro0
		add_idea = zoro1
		add_idea = zoro2
		add_idea = zoro3
		add_idea = zoro4
		}

##################################################

		if = {

		NOT = { has_idea = katholisch1 }
		}

		}

		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> Katholisch
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = protestant0
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		}
		
		if = {

		NOT = { has_idea = protestant2 }
		}

		add_idea = katholisch1
		}

		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Anglican
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = anglican
		has_idea_group = protestant0
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = ancli0
		}

		if = {

		add_idea_group = islam0
		}

######### Protestant --> Buddhism

		if = {

			}

		NOT = { has_idea = protestant1 }

		add_idea_group = budda0
		}

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = protestant6
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		add_idea = norse6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = protestant7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		add_idea = norse6
		add_idea = norse7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Romuva
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea_group = protestant0
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = protestant1
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = protestant2
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = protestant3
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = protestant4
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3
		add_idea = romuva4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = protestant5
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant6 }
		}

		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3
		add_idea = romuva4
		add_idea = romuva5
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {

			religion = romuva
			}

		NOT = { has_idea = protestant7 }
		}

		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3
		add_idea = romuva4
		add_idea = romuva5
		add_idea = romuva6
		}

		if = {
		limit = {

			}

		NOT = { has_idea = protestant1 }
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = protestant2 }

			religion = slavic

		NOT = { has_idea = protestant5 }

		add_idea_group = slav0

		add_idea = slav4
		}

		limit = {

			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed

		NOT = { has_idea = protestant6 }

		}

			}

		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Hellenism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = hellenic
			religion = hellenic_pagan
			}
		has_idea_group = protestant0
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = helle0
		}

			religion_group = hellenic
			religion = hellenic_pagan

		NOT = { has_idea = protestant2 }
		}

		}

		if = {

			religion = manichaeism
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = protestant1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = mane0
		}

		}

		add_idea_group = feti0

		add_idea_group = inti0

		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = reformiert4
		NOT = { has_idea = reformiert5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = reformiert0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Hindu
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea_group = reformiert0
		NOT = { has_idea = reformiert1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = reformiert0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = reformiert1
		NOT = { has_idea = reformiert2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = reformiert0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = reformiert2
		NOT = { has_idea = reformiert3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = reformiert0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2

		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3

		add_idea = hindu5
		}

		}
		remove_idea_group = reformiert0
		add_idea_group = hindu0

		add_idea = hindu6
		}

		if = {

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = reformiert0
		NOT = { has_idea = reformiert1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = reformiert0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = reformiert1
		NOT = { has_idea = reformiert2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = reformiert0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism

			religion = mahayana

		}

		add_idea_group = budda0

		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		}

		OR = {

		has_idea = reformiert5

		if = {

		}
		remove_idea_group = reformiert0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Romuva
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea_group = reformiert0
		NOT = { has_idea = reformiert1 }
		}

######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = reformiert0
		NOT = { has_idea = reformiert1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = reformiert0

		add_idea_group = protestant0

		add_idea = protestant2
		add_idea = protestant3
		add_idea = protestant4
		add_idea = protestant5
		add_idea = protestant6
		}

		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea = orthodox7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = orthodox0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea = protestant1
		add_idea = protestant2
		add_idea = protestant3
		add_idea = protestant4
		add_idea = protestant5

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = orthodox0
		NOT = { has_idea = orthodox1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = orthodox0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = orthodox1
		NOT = { has_idea = orthodox2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = orthodox0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = orthodox2
		NOT = { has_idea = orthodox3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = orthodox0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {

		add_idea = budda3

			}

		NOT = { has_idea = orthodox5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = orthodox0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = orthodox5
		NOT = { has_idea = orthodox6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = orthodox0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		}

		limit = {

		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		add_idea = budda6
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = orthodox3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = orthodox0
		add_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea = mesoam1
		add_idea = mesoam2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = orthodox3
		NOT = { has_idea = orthodox4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = orthodox0
		add_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea = mesoam1
		add_idea = mesoam2
		add_idea = mesoam3
		}

		add_idea = mesoam4
		}

		if = {

		}

		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		}

######### Protestant --> Islam
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = muslim
		has_idea_group = islam0
		NOT = { has_idea = islam1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = islam0
		add_idea_group = islam0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = muslim
		has_idea = islam1
		NOT = { has_idea = islam2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = islam0

		}

		if = {
		limit = {

		has_idea_group = islam0
		NOT = { has_idea = islam1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = islam0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic

		NOT = { has_idea = islam2 }
		}

		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1

		add_idea = cathar1
		add_idea = cathar2
		add_idea = cathar3
		add_idea = cathar4
		add_idea = cathar5
		add_idea = cathar6
		}

		has_idea = islam7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = islam0
		add_idea_group = cathar0

		add_idea = mane1
		add_idea = mane2
		add_idea = mane3
		add_idea = mane4
		add_idea = mane5
		add_idea = mane6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = islam7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = islam0
		add_idea_group = mane0
		add_idea = mane1
		add_idea = mane2
		add_idea = mane3
		add_idea = mane4
		add_idea = mane5
		add_idea = mane6
		add_idea = mane7
		}

		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = tengri2
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea = confuci1
		add_idea = confuci2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = tengri3
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea = confuci1
		add_idea = confuci2
		add_idea = confuci3
		}

		religion  = confucianism

		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = tengri0
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = tengri1
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism

		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		}

		add_idea = budda3

		add_idea = budda5

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Nordisch
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea_group = tengri0
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = tengri1
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed

		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		}

		}

		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1

		add_idea = norse4
		}

######### Protestant --> Shinto
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea_group = tengri0
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea = tengri1
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea = shinto1
		}

		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea = tengri2

		}

		add_idea = shinto1
		add_idea = shinto2
		}

######### Protestant --> Islam
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = muslim
		has_idea_group = hindu0
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = islam0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = muslim
		has_idea = hindu1
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = islam0
		add_idea = islam1
		}

		limit = {
		religion_group  = muslim

		NOT = { has_idea = hindu3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = islam0
		add_idea = islam1
		add_idea = islam2
		}

		}

		if = {

		}

		}

		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = hindu0
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hindu1
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hindu2
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		}

		}

		NOT = { has_idea = hindu7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0

		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5

		}

		add_idea = norse5
		add_idea = norse6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = hindu7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		add_idea = norse6
		add_idea = norse7
		}

		add_idea_group = inti0
		add_idea = inti1
		add_idea = inti2
		add_idea = inti3
		add_idea = inti4
		add_idea = inti5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = inti
		has_idea = hindu6
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = inti0
		add_idea = inti1
		add_idea = inti2
		add_idea = inti3
		add_idea = inti4
		add_idea = inti5
		add_idea = inti6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {

		has_idea = hindu7
		
		}

		add_idea = inti5
		add_idea = inti6
		add_idea = inti7

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> Katholisch
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = confuci0
		NOT = { has_idea = confuci1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		}

		limit = {

		}

		}

		}

		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = confuci4
		NOT = { has_idea = confuci5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = confuci5
		NOT = { has_idea = confuci6 }

		add_idea = tengri5
		}

		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		add_idea = tengri5
		add_idea = tengri6
		}

		limit = {

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Hindu
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea_group = confuci0
		NOT = { has_idea = confuci1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = confuci1
		NOT = { has_idea = confuci2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = confuci2
		NOT = { has_idea = confuci3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		}

		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic

		NOT = { has_idea = confuci4 }

		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		}

		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic

		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		}

		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = confuci5
		NOT = { has_idea = confuci6 }
		}

		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = confuci6
		NOT = { has_idea = confuci7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic

		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = hindu0

		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		add_idea = hindu7

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Confucianism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea_group = confuci0
		NOT = { has_idea = confuci1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = confuci0
		}

		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism

		NOT = { has_idea = confuci2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea = confuci1
		}

		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism

		NOT = { has_idea = confuci3 }
		}

		add_idea_group = confuci0

		add_idea = confuci2

		add_idea = confuci2
		add_idea = confuci3
		add_idea = confuci4
		}

		add_idea = confuci5
		}

		add_idea = confuci3

		add_idea = confuci5

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = confuci0
		NOT = { has_idea = confuci1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = confuci1
		NOT = { has_idea = confuci2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana

		NOT = { has_idea = confuci3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0

		add_idea = budda2
		}

		}

		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = confuci5
		NOT = { has_idea = confuci6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = confuci6
		NOT = { has_idea = confuci7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		add_idea = budda6
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {

		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea = coptic1
		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		add_idea = coptic5
		add_idea = coptic6
		add_idea = coptic7
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = confuci7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		add_idea = animist5
		add_idea = animist6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = confuci7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		add_idea = animist5
		add_idea = animist6
		add_idea = animist7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = confuci0
		NOT = { has_idea = confuci1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea_group = feti0
		}

		add_idea = protestant2
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = budda0
		NOT = { has_idea = budda1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = budda1
		NOT = { has_idea = budda2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana

		}

		add_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea = jew1
		add_idea = jew2
		add_idea = jew3
		add_idea = jew4
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = budda6 }

		remove_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea = nahu1
		add_idea = nahu2
		add_idea = nahu3
		add_idea = nahu4
		add_idea = nahu5
		add_idea = nahu6
		}

		limit = {
		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea = budda7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea = nahu1
		add_idea = nahu2
		add_idea = nahu3
		add_idea = nahu4
		add_idea = nahu5
		add_idea = nahu6
		add_idea = nahu7
		}

		add_idea = orthodox5
		}

		limit = {
		religion = orthodox
		has_idea = norse6
		NOT = { has_idea = norse7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea_group = orthodox0
		add_idea = orthodox1
		add_idea = orthodox2
		add_idea = orthodox3
		add_idea = orthodox4
		add_idea = orthodox5
		add_idea = orthodox6
		}

		add_idea = cathar1
		add_idea = cathar2
		}

		limit = {

		NOT = { has_idea = norse4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea = cathar1
		add_idea = cathar2
		add_idea = cathar3
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = norse4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea_group = mane0
		add_idea = mane1
		add_idea = mane2
		add_idea = mane3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = norse4
		NOT = { has_idea = norse5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea_group = mane0
		add_idea = mane1
		add_idea = mane2
		add_idea = mane3
		add_idea = mane4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = norse5
		NOT = { has_idea = norse6 }

		add_idea = mane1
		add_idea = mane2
		add_idea = mane3
		add_idea = mane4
		add_idea = mane5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean

		has_idea = norse6
		NOT = { has_idea = norse7 }

		add_idea = mane2
		add_idea = mane3
		add_idea = mane4
		add_idea = mane5
		add_idea = mane6
		}

		}
		remove_idea_group = norse0

		add_idea = mane4
		add_idea = mane5

		}

		if = {

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> Katholisch
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = shinto1
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea = katholisch1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = shinto2
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea = katholisch1
		add_idea = katholisch2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = shinto3
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea = katholisch1
		add_idea = katholisch2
		add_idea = katholisch3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = shinto4
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea = katholisch1
		add_idea = katholisch2
		add_idea = katholisch3
		add_idea = katholisch4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = shinto5
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea = katholisch1
		add_idea = katholisch2
		add_idea = katholisch3
		add_idea = katholisch4
		add_idea = katholisch5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = shinto6
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea = katholisch1
		add_idea = katholisch2
		add_idea = katholisch3
		add_idea = katholisch4
		add_idea = katholisch5
		add_idea = katholisch6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = shinto7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea = katholisch1
		add_idea = katholisch2
		add_idea = katholisch3
		add_idea = katholisch4
		add_idea = katholisch5
		add_idea = katholisch6
		add_idea = katholisch7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> Protestant 
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea = shinto1
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea = protestant1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea = shinto2
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea = protestant1
		add_idea = protestant2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea = shinto3
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea = protestant1
		add_idea = protestant2
		add_idea = protestant3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea = shinto4
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea = protestant1
		add_idea = protestant2
		add_idea = protestant3
		add_idea = protestant4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea = shinto5
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea = protestant1
		add_idea = protestant2
		add_idea = protestant3
		add_idea = protestant4
		add_idea = protestant5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea = shinto6
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea = protestant1
		add_idea = protestant2
		add_idea = protestant3
		add_idea = protestant4
		add_idea = protestant5
		add_idea = protestant6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea = shinto7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea = protestant1
		add_idea = protestant2
		add_idea = protestant3
		add_idea = protestant4
		add_idea = protestant5
		add_idea = protestant6
		add_idea = protestant7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> Reformiert
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = reformed
		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = reformiert0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = reformed
		has_idea = shinto1
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = reformiert0
		add_idea = reformiert1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = reformed
		has_idea = shinto2
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = reformiert0
		add_idea = reformiert1
		add_idea = reformiert2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = reformed
		has_idea = shinto3
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = reformiert0
		add_idea = reformiert1
		add_idea = reformiert2
		add_idea = reformiert3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = reformed
		has_idea = shinto4
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = reformiert0
		add_idea = reformiert1
		add_idea = reformiert2
		add_idea = reformiert3
		add_idea = reformiert4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = reformed
		has_idea = shinto5
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = reformiert0
		add_idea = reformiert1
		add_idea = reformiert2
		add_idea = reformiert3
		add_idea = reformiert4
		add_idea = reformiert5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = reformed
		has_idea = shinto6
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = reformiert0
		add_idea = reformiert1
		add_idea = reformiert2
		add_idea = reformiert3
		add_idea = reformiert4
		add_idea = reformiert5
		add_idea = reformiert6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = reformed
		has_idea = shinto7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = reformiert0
		add_idea = reformiert1
		add_idea = reformiert2
		add_idea = reformiert3
		add_idea = reformiert4
		add_idea = reformiert5
		add_idea = reformiert6
		add_idea = reformiert7
		}

		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Anglican
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = anglican
		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = ancli0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = anglican
		has_idea = shinto1
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea = ancli1
		}

######### Protestant --> Islam
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = muslim
		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = islam0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = muslim
		has_idea = shinto1
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = islam0
		add_idea = islam1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = muslim
		has_idea = shinto2
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = islam0
		add_idea = islam1
		add_idea = islam2
		}
		
		if = {

		}

		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		add_idea = hindu7
		}

		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Confucianism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = confuci0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = shinto1
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea = confuci1
		}

		add_idea = confuci4
		}

		add_idea = confuci2

		add_idea = confuci4
		add_idea = confuci5
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = shinto1
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism

			religion = mahayana

		}

		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = shinto6 }

		}

		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		add_idea = budda6
		}

		if = {

		add_idea_group = norse0
		}

		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed

		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}

		}

		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea = shinto4
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = zoro0
		add_idea = zoro1
		add_idea = zoro2
		add_idea = zoro3
		add_idea = zoro4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea = shinto5
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto6 }
		}

		add_idea = zoro1
		add_idea = zoro2
		add_idea = zoro3
		add_idea = zoro4
		add_idea = zoro5
		}

		add_idea = zoro2
		add_idea = zoro3
		add_idea = zoro4
		add_idea = zoro5
		add_idea = zoro6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {

		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Mesoamerican
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = mesoam0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = shinto1
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea = mesoam1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = shinto2
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea = mesoam1
		add_idea = mesoam2
		}

		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = shinto3
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto4 }
		}

		add_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea = mesoam1

		}

		}

		add_idea = mesoam5
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> Katholisch
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = cathar0
		NOT = { has_idea = cathar1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = cathar1
		NOT = { has_idea = cathar2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		add_idea = katholisch1
		}
		
		if = {

		}

		}

		add_idea = katholisch5
		}

		add_idea_group = islam0
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = cathar0
		NOT = { has_idea = cathar1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}

		NOT = { has_idea = cathar2 }
		}

		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}

			religion = buddhism

			religion = mahayana

		}
		remove_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea_group = budda0

		add_idea = budda3
		}

			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana

		add_idea = budda2

		}

		}

		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		add_idea = budda6

		}

		remove_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea_group = inti0
		add_idea = inti1
		add_idea = inti2
		add_idea = inti3
		add_idea = inti4
		add_idea = inti5
		add_idea = inti6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = inti
		has_idea = cathar7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea_group = inti0
		add_idea = inti1
		add_idea = inti2
		add_idea = inti3
		add_idea = inti4
		add_idea = inti5
		add_idea = inti6
		add_idea = inti7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> Katholisch

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = coptic0
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		}

		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		add_idea = tengri5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = coptic6
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		add_idea = tengri5
		add_idea = tengri6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = coptic7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		add_idea = tengri5
		add_idea = tengri6
		add_idea = tengri7
		}

		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Hindu
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea_group = coptic0
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = coptic1
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = coptic2
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = coptic3
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = coptic4
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = coptic5
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = coptic6
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = coptic7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		add_idea = hindu7
		}

		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Confucianism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea_group = coptic0
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = confuci0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = coptic1
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea = confuci1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = coptic2

		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0

		add_idea = confuci1
		add_idea = confuci2
		}

		add_idea = confuci1
		add_idea = confuci2
		add_idea = confuci3
		add_idea = confuci4
		}

		}

		add_idea = confuci3

		add_idea = confuci5
		add_idea = confuci6

		add_idea = confuci2

		add_idea = confuci5
		add_idea = confuci6
		add_idea = confuci7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = coptic0
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = coptic1
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = coptic2
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = coptic3
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = coptic4
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = coptic5
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = coptic6
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		add_idea = budda6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = coptic7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		add_idea = budda6
		add_idea = budda7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> Nordisch
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea_group = coptic0
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = coptic1
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = coptic2
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = coptic3
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = coptic4
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = coptic5
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = coptic6
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		add_idea = norse6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = coptic7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		add_idea = norse6
		add_idea = norse7
		}

		if = {

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Romuva
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea_group = coptic0
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = coptic1
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = coptic2
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva

		NOT = { has_idea = coptic4 }

######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = coptic0
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = feti0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = coptic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = feti0
		add_idea = feti1
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = coptic2
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = feti0
		add_idea = feti1
		add_idea = feti2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = coptic3
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = feti0
		add_idea = feti1
		add_idea = feti2
		add_idea = feti3
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> Katholisch

		if = {

		}

######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {

			}

		NOT = { has_idea = romuva1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}

		}
		remove_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}

		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = romuva5
		NOT = { has_idea = romuva6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = romuva6
		NOT = { has_idea = romuva7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		add_idea = budda6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = romuva7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		add_idea = budda6
		add_idea = budda7

		add_idea = jew6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = romuva7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea = jew1
		add_idea = jew2
		add_idea = jew3
		add_idea = jew4
		add_idea = jew5
		add_idea = jew6
		add_idea = jew7
		}

		add_idea = nahu3
		add_idea = nahu4
		add_idea = nahu5
		add_idea = nahu6
		add_idea = nahu7
		}


		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Mesoamerican
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea_group = romuva0
		NOT = { has_idea = romuva1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea_group = mesoam0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = romuva1
		NOT = { has_idea = romuva2 }
		}

		add_idea = mesoam1
		}

		add_idea = orthodox2
		add_idea = orthodox3
		add_idea = orthodox4
		add_idea = orthodox5
		add_idea = orthodox6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = orthodox
		has_idea = suomi7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea_group = orthodox0
		add_idea = orthodox1
		add_idea = orthodox2
		add_idea = orthodox3
		add_idea = orthodox4
		add_idea = orthodox5
		add_idea = orthodox6

		add_idea = cathar1
		add_idea = cathar2
		add_idea = cathar3
		}

		limit = {

		}

		add_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea = cathar1

			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = suomi4
		NOT = { has_idea = suomi5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea_group = mane0
		add_idea = mane1
		add_idea = mane2
		add_idea = mane3
		add_idea = mane4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = suomi5
		NOT = { has_idea = suomi6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea_group = mane0
		add_idea = mane1
		add_idea = mane2
		add_idea = mane3
		add_idea = mane4
		add_idea = mane5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean

		}
		has_idea = suomi6
		NOT = { has_idea = suomi7 }
		}

		add_idea = mane2
		add_idea = mane3
		add_idea = mane4
		add_idea = mane5
		add_idea = mane6
		}
		
		if = {

		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> Katholisch
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = jew0
		NOT = { has_idea = jew1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		}

		limit = {

		has_idea = jew2
		NOT = { has_idea = jew3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea = confuci1
		add_idea = confuci2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = jew3
		NOT = { has_idea = jew4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea = confuci1
		add_idea = confuci2
		add_idea = confuci3
		}

		religion  = confucianism

		add_idea = confuci1

		add_idea = confuci3
		add_idea = confuci4
		}

		add_idea = confuci6
		}

		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = jew0
		NOT = { has_idea = jew1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = jew1
		NOT = { has_idea = jew2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = jew2
		NOT = { has_idea = jew3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = jew3
		NOT = { has_idea = jew4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = jew4
		NOT = { has_idea = jew5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = jew5
		NOT = { has_idea = jew6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = jew6
		NOT = { has_idea = jew7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		add_idea = budda6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = jew7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		add_idea = budda6
		add_idea = budda7

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Nordisch
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea_group = jew0
		NOT = { has_idea = jew1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = jew1
		NOT = { has_idea = jew2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = jew2
		NOT = { has_idea = jew3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = jew3
		NOT = { has_idea = jew4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {

		has_idea = jew4
		NOT = { has_idea = jew5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = jew5
		NOT = { has_idea = jew6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {

		NOT = { has_idea = jew7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		add_idea = norse6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = jew7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = jew0

		has_idea = slav7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = slav0
		add_idea_group = helle0
		add_idea = helle1
		add_idea = helle2
		add_idea = helle3
		add_idea = helle4
		add_idea = helle5
		add_idea = helle6
		add_idea = helle7
		}

		add_idea_group = tote0
		add_idea = tote1
		add_idea = tote2
		add_idea = tote3
		add_idea = tote4
		}

		add_idea = tote1

		}

		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		}

		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = helle4
		NOT = { has_idea = helle5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = helle0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2

		}

		add_idea_group = budda0
		}

			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = helle7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = helle0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3
		add_idea = romuva4
		add_idea = romuva5
		add_idea = romuva6
		add_idea = romuva7
		}

		remove_idea_group = helle0
		add_idea_group = feti0
		add_idea = feti1

		add_idea = feti3
		add_idea = feti4
		add_idea = feti5
		add_idea = feti6
		add_idea = feti7
		}

		add_idea = reformiert3
		add_idea = reformiert4
		add_idea = reformiert5
		add_idea = reformiert6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = reformed
		has_idea = mane7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = mane0
		add_idea_group = reformiert0
		add_idea = reformiert1
		add_idea = reformiert2
		add_idea = reformiert3
		add_idea = reformiert4
		add_idea = reformiert5
		add_idea = reformiert6
		add_idea = reformiert7
		}

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = mane4
		NOT = { has_idea = mane5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mane0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		}

		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed

		add_idea = slav4
		add_idea = slav5
		add_idea = slav6
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = mane7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = mane0
		add_idea_group = slav0
		add_idea = slav1
		add_idea = slav2
		add_idea = slav3
		add_idea = slav4
		add_idea = slav5

		}

		limit = {
		religion = inti
		has_idea = mane2
		NOT = { has_idea = mane3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mane0
		add_idea_group = inti0
		add_idea = inti1
		add_idea = inti2
		}

		if = {
		limit = {

		}

		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = animist2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = animist2
		NOT = { has_idea = animist3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed

		add_idea = tengri3
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Hindu
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea_group = animist0
		NOT = { has_idea = animist1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = animist1
		NOT = { has_idea = animist2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = animist2
		NOT = { has_idea = animist3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = animist3

		}

		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1

		add_idea = hindu3
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = animist5 }
		}

		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		}

		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic

		}

		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		}

		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic

		NOT = { has_idea = animist7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic

		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0

		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = animist0
		NOT = { has_idea = animist1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = animist1
		NOT = { has_idea = animist2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = animist2
		NOT = { has_idea = animist3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = animist3
		NOT = { has_idea = animist4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = animist4
		NOT = { has_idea = animist5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = animist5
		NOT = { has_idea = animist6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = animist6
		NOT = { has_idea = animist7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5
		add_idea = budda6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = animist7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		add_idea = budda3
		add_idea = budda4
		add_idea = budda5

		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		add_idea = coptic5
		add_idea = coptic6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = coptic
		has_idea = animist7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea = coptic1
		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		add_idea = coptic5
		add_idea = coptic6
		add_idea = coptic7
		}

		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		add_idea = animist5
		add_idea = animist6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = animist7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		add_idea = animist5
		add_idea = animist6
		add_idea = animist7
		}

######### Protestant --> Fetishismus

		if = {

			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = animist0
		NOT = { has_idea = animist1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = feti0
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = feti5 }

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = feti0
		NOT = { has_idea = feti1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = feti0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = feti1
		NOT = { has_idea = feti2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = feti0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = feti2
		NOT = { has_idea = feti3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = feti0
		add_idea_group = budda0

		add_idea = jew2
		add_idea = jew3
		add_idea = jew4
		add_idea = jew5
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = feti7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = feti0
		add_idea_group = jew0
		add_idea = jew1
		add_idea = jew2

		add_idea = nahu1
		add_idea = nahu2
		add_idea = nahu3
		add_idea = nahu4
		add_idea = nahu5
		add_idea = nahu6
		add_idea = nahu7
		}


		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Mesoamerican
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea_group = feti0
		NOT = { has_idea = feti1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = feti0
		add_idea_group = mesoam0
		}

		limit = {

		}

		add_idea = orthodox6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = orthodox
		has_idea = zoro7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoro0
		add_idea_group = orthodox0
		add_idea = orthodox1
		add_idea = orthodox2
		add_idea = orthodox3
		add_idea = orthodox4
		add_idea = orthodox5
		add_idea = orthodox6
		add_idea = orthodox7
		}

		}

		}

		limit = {
		religion  = cathar
		has_idea = zoro4
		NOT = { has_idea = zoro5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoro0
		add_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea = cathar1
		add_idea = cathar2
		add_idea = cathar3
		add_idea = cathar4
		}

		}

		add_idea_group = mane0
		add_idea = mane1
		add_idea = mane2
		add_idea = mane3
		add_idea = mane4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = zoro5
		NOT = { has_idea = zoro6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoro0
		add_idea_group = mane0
		add_idea = mane1
		add_idea = mane2
		add_idea = mane3
		add_idea = mane4
		add_idea = mane5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = zoro6
		NOT = { has_idea = zoro7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoro0
		add_idea_group = mane0
		add_idea = mane1
		add_idea = mane2
		add_idea = mane3
		add_idea = mane4
		add_idea = mane5
		add_idea = mane6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = zoro7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoro0
		add_idea_group = mane0

		add_idea = mane2
		add_idea = mane3
		add_idea = mane4
		add_idea = mane5
		add_idea = mane6
		add_idea = mane7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> Katholisch
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = ancli0
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = katholisch0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = ancli1
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli2 }
		}

		}

		add_idea_group = confuci0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = ancli1
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = confuci0
		add_idea = confuci1
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = ancli0
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}

		OR = {	
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
			religion = suomenusko
			}
		has_idea = ancli4
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea = suomi1
		add_idea = suomi2
		add_idea = suomi3
		add_idea = suomi4

		has_idea_group = ancli0

		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = jew0
		}

		}

		add_idea_group = zoro0
		add_idea = zoro1
		add_idea = zoro2
		add_idea = zoro3
		add_idea = zoro4
		add_idea = zoro5
		}

		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea = ancli6
		NOT = { has_idea = ancli7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ancli0
		add_idea_group = zoro0
		add_idea = zoro1
		add_idea = zoro2
		add_idea = zoro3
		add_idea = zoro4
		add_idea = zoro5
		add_idea = zoro6

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea = nahu1
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea = shinto1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea = nahu2
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea = shinto1
		add_idea = shinto2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea = nahu3
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea = shinto1
		add_idea = shinto2
		add_idea = shinto3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea = nahu4
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea = shinto1
		add_idea = shinto2
		add_idea = shinto3
		add_idea = shinto4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto

		NOT = { has_idea = nahu6 }
		}

		add_idea = shinto1
		add_idea = shinto2
		add_idea = shinto3
		add_idea = shinto4
		add_idea = shinto5
		}

		add_idea = shinto5

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Romuva
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea_group = nahu0
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = nahu1
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = nahu2
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = nahu3
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = nahu4
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3
		add_idea = romuva4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = nahu5
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3
		add_idea = romuva4
		add_idea = romuva5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = nahu6
		NOT = { has_idea = nahu7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3
		add_idea = romuva4
		add_idea = romuva5
		add_idea = romuva6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = nahu7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahu0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3

		add_idea = romuva6

		}

		add_idea = helle1

		}

		add_idea = inti6
		add_idea = inti7
		}

		add_idea = tengri4
		add_idea = tengri5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = mesoam6
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoam7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		add_idea = tengri5
		add_idea = tengri6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {

		}

		add_idea = tengri7

		if = {

		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = mesoam0
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoam1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana

		add_idea = budda3

######### Protestant --> Romuva
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea_group = mesoam0
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoam1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = mesoam0
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoam1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoam0
		add_idea_group = feti0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {

		}

		limit = {
		religion = protestant

		add_idea = protestant2

		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = inti0
		NOT = { has_idea = inti1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = inti0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = inti1
		NOT = { has_idea = inti2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = inti0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = inti2
		NOT = { has_idea = inti3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = inti0
		add_idea_group = budda0
		add_idea = budda1
		add_idea = budda2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = inti3
		NOT = { has_idea = inti4 }
		}

		add_idea = jew1
		add_idea = jew2
		add_idea = jew3
		add_idea = jew4
		add_idea = jew5
		add_idea = jew6
		}

		has_idea = inti7

		has_idea_group = inti0

		}

		}

		religion  = cathar
		has_idea = tote5
		NOT = { has_idea = tote6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tote0
		add_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea = cathar1
		add_idea = cathar2
		add_idea = cathar3
		add_idea = cathar4
		add_idea = cathar5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = cathar

		add_idea = cathar4
		add_idea = cathar5
		add_idea = cathar6
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = tote6 }

		remove_idea_group = tote0
		add_idea_group = mane0
		add_idea = mane1
		add_idea = mane2
		add_idea = mane3
		add_idea = mane4
		add_idea = mane5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = tote6
		NOT = { has_idea = tote7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tote0
		add_idea_group = mane0
		add_idea = mane1
		add_idea = mane2
		add_idea = mane3
		add_idea = mane4
		add_idea = mane5
		add_idea = mane6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = tote7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = tote0
		add_idea_group = mane0
		add_idea = mane1
		add_idea = mane2
		add_idea = mane3
		add_idea = mane4
		add_idea = mane5
		add_idea = mane6
		add_idea = mane7
		}
